New Records: Shohei Ohtani became the first player to hit 50 home runs and steal 50 bases in the same season during the Miami Marlins vs Los Angeles Dodgers game on 2024-09-20.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani achieved the 50-50 milestone with a six-for-six performance, including three home runs, two stolen bases, and 10 RBIs in the game against the Miami Marlins.
Post-Match Reflections: Shohei Ohtani's historic performance was celebrated by his teammates and the Dodgers organization, marking a pivotal moment in their season.
